tasks.name: Complete project proposal
tasks.description: Finish writing and editing the proposal document for the upcoming project deadline.

tasks.name: Attend team meeting
tasks.description: Attend the weekly team meeting to discuss project progress and updates.

tasks.name: Submit monthly report
tasks.description: Prepare and submit the monthly report to the management team with the project status, budget, and performance metrics.

tasks.name: Wake up for suhoor
tasks.description: Wake up early in the morning to eat a pre-dawn meal before starting the fast for the day.

tasks.name: Read Quran
tasks.description: Read a portion of the Quran every day during Ramadan to increase your knowledge and understanding of the religion.

tasks.name: Give charity
tasks.description: Make a donation to a charitable cause during Ramadan to help those in need.

tasks.name: Attend Tarawih prayers
tasks.description: Attend the nightly Tarawih prayers at the mosque during Ramadan to strengthen your spiritual connection with Allah.
